Module suchagame.suchagame
Package suchagame.ui

Class Game

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
suchagame.ui.Game
public class Game extends javafx.application.Application
Main class of the game. Initializes the game loop and the game scene.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the game. Launches the game.
      Parameters:

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws Exception
      Starts the game. Initializes the game loop, the game scene and ECS system.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage to be used
      Throws:
      Exception - if the game scene cannot be loaded

    • endGame

      public static void endGame(String end_message)
      Ends the game. Stops the game loop and removes all entities and systems. Finally, displays the end game screen with the given message.
      Parameters:
      end_message - the message to be displayed
